Title: Pre-procurement milestones
Description: For events during the planning or pre-procurement phase of a process, such as the preparation of key studies.

Title: Approval milestones
Description: For events such as the sign-off of a contract or project.

Title: Engagement milestones
Description: For engagement milestones, such as a public hearing.

Title: Assessment milestones
Description: For assessment and adjudication milestones, such as the meeting date of a committee.

Title: Delivery milestones
Description: For delivery milestones, such as the date when a good or service is to be provided.

Title: Reporting milestones
Description: For reporting milestones, such as when key reports are to be provided.

Title: Financing milestones
Description: For events related to the funding of the contracting process. In public-private partnerships, such events might include, for example, planned payments and equity transfers.

Title: Payment milestones
Description: For payment milestones, such as the date when a payment is expected to be made to a supplier. If the `status` of a contract's payment milestone is 'met', then the contract ought to have an entry for the payment under its `implementation.transactions`.
